A 12-year-old girl has been charged after an assault involving schoolgirls in Aberdeenshire.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
Police Scotland said it followed reports of an incident in Fraserburgh on Tuesday.
The girl will be reported to the Youth Justice Management Unit.
